recommended_treatment: Try Zyrtec instead of Allegra; Samples of Nasonex two sprays in each nostril for three weeks; A prescription was written.
Laparoscopic antecolic antegastric Roux-en-Y gastric bypass with EEA anastomosis.

Neck exploration; tracheostomy; urgent flexible bronchoscopy via tracheostomy site; removal of foreign body, tracheal metallic stent material; dilation distal trachea; placement of #8 Shiley single cannula tracheostomy tube.
